text: The Conference des Grandes Écoles (CGE) is an association of Grandes écoles of engineering and management, all recognized by the state and delivering a national degree after at least 5 years of higher education. Some companies, alumni associations and organizations are also member of CGE.Conférence des Grandes Écoles (CGE) It also organizes the Mastère Spécialisé, the Mastère en sciences and the BADGE programs. ==References== ==Further reading== * Official website Category:Education in France
title: Conférence des Grandes Écoles
